trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract class for supporting formatting services to a line of text.
trans-unit.target: 为支持为文本行的格式设置服务提供一个抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor must be called for every class that is inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine>.
trans-unit.target: 必须为每个类都继承自<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine>调用此构造函数

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the top to the baseline of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取从顶部到当前的基线的距离<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the baseline distance.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示基线距离。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Create a collapsed line based on collapsed text properties.
trans-unit.target: 创建基于折叠的文本属性折叠的行。

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsingProperties"></xref> objects that represent the collapsed text properties.
trans-unit.target: 一份<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsingProperties"></xref>表示折叠的文本属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref> value that represents a collapsed line that can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"> </xref>表示可以显示折叠的行的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of characters following the last character of the line that may trigger reformatting of the current line.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前行的重新格式化，则可能会触发的行的最后一个字符后面的字符数。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the number of characters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，该值表示的字符数。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 释放使用的所有托管和非托管资源<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref> object based upon the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 呈现<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref>对象根据指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object onto which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref> is rendered.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref>拖放到这些对象<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref>呈现。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> value that represents the drawing origin.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref>值，该值表示绘图的原点。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.InvertAxes"></xref> value that indicates the inversion of the horizontal and vertical axes of the drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: 枚举<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.InvertAxes"></xref>值，该值指示反向的水平和垂直轴的绘图图面。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the top-most to bottom-most black pixel in a line.
trans-unit.target: 获取到的行中的最底部的黑色像素从最顶层的距离。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the extent distance.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示的范围距离。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous character hit after backspacing.
trans-unit.target: 获取命中退格后前一个字符。

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> object after backspacing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"> </xref>退格后的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the character hit corresponding to the specified distance from the beginning of the line.
trans-unit.target: 获取对应于指定的距离，从行的开头字符命中。

trans-unit.source: The text flow direction determines how the distance is measured.
trans-unit.target: 与文字排列方向确定距离的测量方式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> value that represents the distance from the beginning of the line.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示行的开头之间的距离的值。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The object at the specified distance from the beginning of the line.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定的对象 distance 从行的开头。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the beginning of the line to the specified character hit.
trans-unit.target: 获取从行的开头到指定的字符命中的距离。

trans-unit.source: The text flow direction determines how the distance is measured.
trans-unit.target: 与文字排列方向确定距离的测量方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> object whose distance you want to query.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"> </xref>对象您想要查询其距离。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the distance from the beginning of the line.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，它表示从行的开头的距离。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for enumerating <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取枚举的枚举数<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"></xref>中的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: By enumerating through the list of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun> objects, the text layout client can obtain glyph information for each text source character.
trans-unit.target: 通过访问列表的枚举<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun>对象时，文本布局客户端可以获取每个文本源字符标志符号信息。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that allows you to enumerate each <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器使您能够枚举每个<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"></xref>对象在<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the next character hit for caret navigation.
trans-unit.target: 获取命中的插入符号导航的下一个字符。

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The next <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> object based on caret navigation.
trans-unit.target: 下一步<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref>对象基于脱字号导航。

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous character hit for caret navigation.
trans-unit.target: 获取命中的插入符号导航前一个字符。

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The previous <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> object based on caret navigation.
trans-unit.target: 上一个<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref>对象基于脱字号导航。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of bounding rectangles that represent the range of characters within a text line.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示的文本行中的字符范围的边界矩形的数组。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the index of first character of specified range.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，该值表示的指定范围的第一个字符的索引。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the number of characters of the specified range.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，该值表示指定的范围的字符数。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextBounds"></xref> objects representing the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 一份<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextBounds"></xref>对象表示的绑定矩形。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of collapsed text ranges after a line has been collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 在折叠行后，请获取折叠的文本范围的集合。

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsedRange"></xref> objects that represent the collapsed text.
trans-unit.target: 一份<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsedRange"></xref>表示折叠的文本的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the line when broken by line breaking process.
trans-unit.target: 获取行换行进程断开的状态。

trans-unit.source: The return value is `null` when the line ends at the end of the paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是`null`行时在段落的结尾结束。

trans-unit.source: The text formatter client may pass the return value back as a parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatLine%2A> method, which allows the value to be used when formatting the next line within the same paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 文本格式化程序客户端可能的返回值传递回作为参数传递给<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatLine%2A>方法，它允许在同一段中的下一步行格式设置时要使用的值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLineBreak"></xref> value that represents the line break.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLineBreak"> </xref>值，该值表示换行。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref> objects in a text span that are contained within a line.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref>文本范围的行中包含的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref> objects contained within a text span.
trans-unit.target: 获取一份<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref>包含在文本范围内的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the line is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示行是否处于折叠状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the line is collapsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果行处于折叠状态;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether content of the line overflows the specified paragraph width.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示行的内容是否超出指定的段落宽度。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, it the line overflows the specified paragraph width; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>它行超出指定的段落宽度;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a line of text.
trans-unit.target: 获取文本行的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the text line height.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，它表示文本行高度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the text line is truncated in the middle of a word.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否在某个词中间截断的文本行。

trans-unit.source: The IsTruncated property value is set only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping> property of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties> is set to <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping>, and a single word is wider than the formatting paragraph width.
trans-unit.target: 仅当设置了有 IsTruncated 属性值<xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping>属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties>设置为<xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping>，并有一个单词的宽度超过格式设置的段落宽度。</xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties> </xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping>

trans-unit.source: In such situation, <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> truncates the line in the middle of the word to honor the desired behavior specified by <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping> setting.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>截断单词遵守指定的所需的行为的中间行<xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping>设置。</xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text line is truncated in the middle of a word; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在某个词; 中间截断的文本行否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> positions of the current line.
trans-unit.target: 获取的总数<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref>的当前行的位置。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the total number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> positions of the current line.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，该值表示的总次数<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref>的当前行的位置。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the edge of the line's highest point to the baseline marker of the line.
trans-unit.target: 获取行的基线标记从行的最高数据点的边缘之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the baseline distance of the marker.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示标记的基线距离。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a marker for a list item.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个标记的列表项的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the height of the marker.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示标记的高度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of newline characters at the end of a line.
trans-unit.target: 获取位于行的末尾处换行字符数。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the number of newline characters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，该值表示换行字符数。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance that black pixels extend beyond the bottom alignment edge of a line.
trans-unit.target: 获取黑色像素超出一条线的底部对齐边缘的距离。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the overhang after distance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，后距离表示延伸。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance that black pixels extend prior to the left leading alignment edge of the line.
trans-unit.target: 获取黑色像素延伸之前的行的左侧前导对齐边缘的距离。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the overhang leading distance.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示延伸的前导距离。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance that black pixels extend following the right trailing alignment edge of the line.
trans-unit.target: 获取黑色像素延伸以下右尾随的行的对齐边缘的距离。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the overhang trailing distance.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示延伸的尾随距离。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the PixelsPerDip at which the text should be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应位于呈现的文本 PixelsPerDip。

trans-unit.source: The current PixelsPerDip value.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 PixelsPerDip 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the start of a paragraph to the starting point of a line.
trans-unit.target: 获取从的段落开始到一条线的起始点的距离。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> value that represents the distance from the start of a paragraph to the starting point of a line.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示从的段落开始到一条线的起始点的距离的值。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the top to the baseline of the line of text.
trans-unit.target: 获取从顶部到的文本行的基线之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> value that represents the text baseline distance.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示文本基线距离的值。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the text and any other content in the line.
trans-unit.target: 获取行中的文本以及任何其他内容的高度。

trans-unit.source: The TextHeight may differ from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.Height%2A> property if the client specified the line height.
trans-unit.target: TextHeight 可能不同于<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.Height%2A>属性，如果客户端指定行高度。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>值。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of whitespace code points beyond the last non-blank character in a line.
trans-unit.target: 获取在行中的空白超出最后一个非空白字符的码位的数。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the number of whitespace code points beyond the last non-blank character in a line.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>表示空格超出在行中的最后一个非空白字符的码位数字的值。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of a line of text, excluding trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: 获取一行文本，不包括尾随空格字符的宽度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the text line width, excluding trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示不包括尾随空格字符的文本线条宽度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of a line of text, including trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: 获取一行文本，包括尾随空白字符的宽度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the text line width, including trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示包括尾随空白字符的文本线条宽度。</xref:System.Double>
